subject: PE Today: Storm System
body:
CBSNews.com












The 
      Public Eye Chat With...Hannah Storm"But I never feel like – 
      sometimes what the news is, the news of the day, is let's say Paris Hilton 
      or Lindsay Lohan. Sometimes that can feel, to everybody, "why are we 
      talking about this?" But you have to cover the topics that everyone is 
      interested in. You just do it smarter, and more intelligent. And I think 
      we do a really good job of that."[+ Read More]

Debate 
      of the Future!Hyperbole Alert! Today’s New York Times 
      discusses an upcoming Democratic debate being co-sponsored by CNN and 
      YouTube. Listen, I’ve said repeatedly here that YouTube is the bull in the 
      political china shop. But let’s not oversell this upcoming debate, 
      either.[+ Read More]

Paris 
      In The LightThe press corps hasn't exactly deigned to 
      contextualize the celeb's sentence, even though analysts were pointing out 
      the relative injustice of it back on June 7. Instead of clear-headed and 
      informed reports about Hilton's jailtime, we' ve mostly seen antagonistic 
      stories that feed into our class resentment and angst-ridden relationship 
      with celebrity culture. [+ Read More]
